href="http://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/news/north-east-news/a1-upgrade-highways-england-reveals-13577739">A1 upgrade: Highways England reveals preferred options for 290m dualling scheme</a></strong><div Newcastle and Ellingham</a></div></div></div><div class="teaser"><figure data-mod="image"><div class="spacer" style="padding-top:66.50%;"></div><a cookies</a></strong><div class="description"><a href="http://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/whats-on/food-drink-news/great-british-bake-off-biscuit-13577371">Watching Great British Bake Off and fancy baking along?
